name: Beckham Law at low income
description: Expat under Beckham Law at €60,000 - below Social Security max base

sources.description: Calculated using 2026 Beckham Law flat rate and Social Security
sources.notes: Beckham tax: 24% of €60,000 = €14,400. SS: 6.50% of €60,000 = €3,900 (below max base). No solidarity.
